blackjack.gui

Class CardMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.gui.CardMap

  • public class CardMap
extends Object
    Contains an image containing all cards.
    Author:
    Jari Avikainen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardMap()
      Constructs a new CardMap from an image read from the defined file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image getCardBack()
      Returns an image of a red back of a card.
      Image getCardBack(String color)
      Returns an image of the back of a card with the colour specified in the parameter colour.
      Image getCardImage(Card card)
      Returns an Image of the card given as a parameter.

        Returns an Image of the card given as a parameter.

      • getCardBack

        public Image getCardBack(String color)
        Returns an image of the back of a card with the colour specified in the parameter colour.
        Parameters:
        color - The colour of the returned back of card.
        Returns:
        Returns an image of the back of a card.
